title: Groupon : TTM gross profit per average active customer 2017 to 2019
yAxis: TTM gross billings per average active customer in U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart representing Quarter in the x axis and TTM gross billings per average active customer in U.S. dollars in the y axis.
Quarter Q1 '19 has the highest TTM gross billings per average active customer in U.S. dollars and Q3 '17 has the lowest TTM gross billings per average active customer in U.S. dollars.
There is a difference of 1.16 between the maximum Quarter Q1 '19 and minimum Quarter Q3 '17.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and TTM gross billings per average active customer in U.S. dollars in each Quarter on the y axis.
The maximum TTM gross billings per average active customer in U.S. dollars 27.59 is found at Quarter Q1 '19 and the minimum is found at Q3 '17 where Quarter is 26.43.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Quarter in the x axis and TTM gross billings per average active customer in U.S. dollars in the y axis.
Quarter Q1 '19 has the highest TTM gross billings per average active customer in U.S. dollars and Q3 '17 has the lowest TTM gross billings per average active customer in U.S. dollars.
There is a difference of 1.16 between the maximum Quarter Q1 '19 and minimum Quarter Q3 '17.
max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and TTM gross billings per average active customer in U.S. dollars in each Quarter on the y axis.
Quarter Q1 '19 has the highest TTM gross billings per average active customer in U.S. dollars and Q3 '17 has the lowest TTM gross billings per average active customer in U.S. dollars.
The second highest TTM gross billings per average active customer in U.S. dollars is appeared to be the Quarter Q3 '18.
The highest Quarter Q1 '19 has 1.16 more TTM gross billings per average active customer in U.S. dollars than the lowest Quarter Q3 '17.
Quarter Q1 '19 is higher than any other Quarters with value 27.59, followed by Q3 '18, and Q3 '18. Down to Quarter Q3 '17 with the lowest value 26.43.
The TTM gross billings per average active customer in U.S. dollars has reduced over the past 10 Quarters.
Quarter Q2 '19, and Q3 '18 have the same TTM gross billings per average active customer in U.S. dollars.
The highest value 27.59 at Q1 '19 is almost 1.01 times larger than the average value 27.25.
